response.overview: It's Christmas time! That means peace on earth and good will towards men. But Gina is feeling a little left out. In every room that Gina enters, there are kinky and raunchy sex acts taking place without her! She thinks that all of her guests have forgotten just who threw this wonderful party, but they have saved the best present for last. Gina gets the fucking of her life in the best Christmas orgy ever. It's a wonderful life after all for this group of sexually insatiable friends!!!
response.tagline: Gina Lynn Throws a Holiday Sex Party!
response.title: Gina's Very Merry Christmas Orgy
